attributes.action: Make the first day of Spring David Attenborough day
attributes.background: David Attenborough has dedicated and lived a life only some of us can dream of. If not for him we would know nothing of the things that go on around us all day everyday. I only find it fitting that we dedicate the first day of spring to an absolute legend. If any day belongs to anyone it is him.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "David Attenborough Day" - for example, whether you would like a new public holiday to be created or not. We're also not sure which day you'd like to be defined as the first day of spring. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
